name: Feint
desc: Absol dashes in an arc, damaging all enemies hit and increasing attack speed for a short time. Each use alternates between a left and right arc. Feint ignores the target’s Defense and bypasses all shields.

name: Slash
desc: Absol quickly slashes in front of themself, damaging any enemy hit by the slash. Slash has an increased cricital-hit rate of +15%.

name: Night Slash
desc:
Absol dashes in an arc, damaging the first Pokémon hit and increasing Absol's attack speed. If Absol hits, this ability can be activated within 6s – allowing Absol to dash again, dealing damage to all enemies hit and increasing attack speed once again. The second hit also has 30% increased Critical-Hit Rate on enemies below 50% max HP.

Cooldown on Hit or without recasting is 6s.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Absol heals for 50% of damage dealt on the second hit, including critical hits.

name: Pursuit
desc: Absol dashes to a location, and dashes to an enemy with its next basic attack. If Absol hits the back of the target, this ability's cooldown is reduced. If it fails to hit the back, damage is halved.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Absol gains 35% increased movement speed for 2s after the initial dash.

name: Psycho Cut
desc: Absol throws a wide slash forward; damaging and slowing enemies hit for 2s. Enemies hit are marked for 5 seconds with 3 cleansable marks. When Absol deals damage to a marked enemy, a mark is consumed, dealing extra damage. All damage dealt by Psycho Cut or its marks have a 15% increased Critical-Hit Rate.

fields.title: Debuff
fields.value: Three slash markers are added. The first two deal 2x damage when triggered, the third deals 3x damage.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Increases Absol's movespeed when near a debuffed enemy.

name: Sucker Punch
desc: Absol targets an enemy and enters a counter stance for a short duration, decreasing the movement speed of the target enemy and Absol for the duration and negating all damage and effects of the next attack on Absol. While in counter stance, if Absol is attacked or the target attacks, Absol immediately exits counter stance and leaps behind the target, stunning it and dealing damage. If the attack is not triggered before the counter stance expires, Absol leaps behind the target, dealing damage.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Increases Attack Speed by 40% for 3s after using this move.

name: Midnight Slash
desc: Unleash a flurry of slashes in front of Absol and become untargetable. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, dealing increased damage shoving enemies.
